data.meta_site_name: Archer & Greiner, P.C. - Nicholas J. Lochetta II
data.text:
Nick has over 25 years of experience representing businesses and individuals in a wide range of commercial litigation matters, real estate tax assessment appeals, and family law matters in state and federal courts in New Jersey and Pennsylvania. Nick also handles litigation involving real estate and real estate transactions such as real estate contractual disputes, boundary disputes, property grading and drainage problems, construction defects, easement issues, and environmental issues.

For transactional matters, Nick regularly represents entities in the preparation, review, negotiation and enforcement of contracts, leases and agreements relating to a variety of commercial and real estate transactions. Nick’s involvement also includes assisting clients in real estate transactions relating to both the purchase and sale of commercial and residential real estate, and the negotiation and preparation of commercial and residential leases.

Nick also represents commercial and industrial property owners in complex real estate tax assessment appeals in Pennsylvania, many times initiated by local School Districts seeking to increase a taxpayer’s real estate tax assessment. He provides advice and real estate tax assessment analysis to property owners at all stages of the tax appeal process. Nick also assists with complex tax appeal issues in New Jersey.
